pubgm: Not available for China, Japan, Korea, Taiwan and Vietnam region
freefire_sgmy: Only available for Singapore, Malaysia, Philippines and Cambodia users
freefire_global: Not available for Vietnam, Thailand and Indonesia users, not available for Middle East Users
genshin: Not available to China users, to receive Genesis Crystals, users must be logged in on PC/Android/iOS
mlbb: Not available for Indonesia users, Indonesian users can use mlbb_global/mlbb_indo
mlbb_exclusive: Not available for Indonesia/Singapore/Myanmar/Cambodia, Indonesian users can use mlbb_global/mlbb_indo, the rest use mlbb_exclusive_global
mlbb_global: Can be used to top up any accounts but mainly used for Indonesian users
ragnarok_origin: Character name must match exactly or it would not work
maplestorym: Packages are maintained by Nexon, if the user is not able to purchase it in-game, we will also not be able to purchase it. If multiple quantities of a package can be bought, the user has to claim the package first before being able to buy another one. Character name must match exactly or it would not work
garena_undawn: Available to Singapore, Malaysian and Brunei users only
honkai_star_rail: Not available to China users, to receive Genesis Crystals, users must be logged in on PC/Android/iOS
maplestoryr: Character name must match exactly or it would not work
undawn_global: Only available for Europe, Middle East and Korean users
mlbb_special: Not available for Indonesia users, Indonesian users can use mlbb_global/mlbb_indo
state_of_survival: Some users may be under purchase ban, this would reflect as invalid UserID
zepeto: User has to create an UserID first
pgr: Please only select the denom corresponding to the platform of the account [Android/iOS]
dbdl: This game should be only available for SEA users
echocalypse: Refer to Codashop page for this game for more information
lifeafter: Servers can be found on NetEase payment page for LifeAfter
onepunchworld: UserID is Perfect World UserID, ServerID is RoleID, no refunds and we cannot verify UserID and RoleID
solo_leveling: Email in userid and Password in serverid, only allow netmarble email password login, not netmarbleid
oncehuman: Available for all users, serverid = Region [ie: Europe], charname = Server Name [iE: PVE01-00109]
ragnarok_idle: Available for US and Asia users
etheria_restart: Available for all users | For those that wants this game, please contact Admin before integrating
